media-feature-keywords.match:
(?xi)
(?<=^|\s|:|\*/)
(?: portrait
| landscape
| progressive
| interlace
| fullscreen
| standalone
| minimal-ui
| browser
| hover
)
(?=\s|\)|$)

(?xi)
(?<=^|\s|\(|\*/)
(?:

(
(?:min-|max-)?
(?: height
| width
| aspect-ratio
| color
| color-index
| monochrome
| resolution
)

)
|

device-

| aspect-ratio
)
)
|

(

[-_]

| epub
| moz

| o

hp|tc|wap|ro
)
|

| prince
)
)
-
[\w-]+
(?=
\s*
(?:
/\*
(?:[^*]|\*[^/])*
\*/
)?
\s*
[:)]
)
)
)
(?=\s|$|[><:=]|\)|/\*)

patterns.match:
(?xi) (?<![\w-])
[-+]?

(?:
[0-9]+ (?:\.[0-9]+)?
| \.[0-9]+
)

(?:
(?<=[0-9])
E
[-+]?
[0-9]+
)?

(?:
(%)
| ( deg|grad|rad|turn
| Hz|kHz
| ch|cm|em|ex|fr|in|mm|mozmm|
pc|pt|px|q|rem|rch|rex|rlh|
ic|ric|rcap|vh|vw|vb|vi|svh|
svw|svb|svi|dvh|dvw|dvb|dvi|
lvh|lvw|lvb|lvi|vmax|vmin|
cqw|cqi|cqh|cqb|cqmin|cqmax
| dpi|dpcm|dppx
| s|ms
)
\b
)?
patterns.name: constant.numeric.css

pseudo-elements.match:
(?xi)
(?:
(::?)
(?: after
| before
| first-letter
| first-line
| (?:-(?:ah|apple|atsc|epub|hp|khtml|moz
|ms|o|rim|ro|tc|wap|webkit|xv)
| (?:mso|prince))
-[a-z-]+
)
|
(::)
(?: backdrop
| content
| grammar-error
| marker
| placeholder
| selection
| shadow
| spelling-error
)
)
(?![\w-]|\s*[;}])
pseudo-elements.name: entity.other.attribute-name.pseudo-element.css

patterns.match:
(?x)
# Qualified namespace prefix
( -?(?!\d)(?:[\w-]|[^\x00-\x7F]|\\(?:[0-9a-fA-F]{1,6}|.))+
| \*
)
# Lookahead to ensure there's a valid identifier ahead
(?=
\| (?!\s|=|$|\])
(?: -?(?!\d)
|   [\\\w-]
|   [^\x00-\x7F]
)
)

patterns.comment: align-content, align-items, align-self, justify-content, justify-items, justify-self

patterns.name: entity.name.tag.less

patterns.comment: CSS style block, eg: style { color: green }
patterns.name: meta.embedded.css

patterns.comment: Less style block, eg: style.less { color: green }
patterns.name: meta.embedded.less

patterns.comment: SCSS style block, eg: style.scss { color: green }
patterns.name: meta.embedded.scss

patterns.comment: Top level blocks parsed as JavaScript
patterns.name: meta.embedded.js

patterns.comment: Consume any whitespace after a comma

concise-html-block.comment: --- HTML block within concise mode content. ---
concise-html-block.name: meta.section.marko-html-block

concise-html-line.comment: -- HTML line within concise mode content. (content-html-mode w/o scriptlet)
concise-html-line.name: meta.section.marko-html-line

javascript-enclosed.comment: Matches JavaScript content and ensures enclosed blocks are matched.

patterns.comment: Attributes begin after the first space within the tag name

tag-before-attrs.comment: Everything in a tag before the attributes content

tag-html.comment: Matches an HTML tag and its contents
